inn1.comm: Dropped! Would you believe it? Kamran Akmal drops a regulation 'keeper catch. It was full in length, outside off stump and Ganguly had a poke at it with an open-face of the bat. Sure, the ball was dipping as it went to the left of Akmal but he should have held it. What a start. Hold your mails. We know many of you don't rate Akmal much.
Way outside the off stump and the umpire extends his arms
Another one sailing harmlessly well outside the off stump, another wide
short of length, slanting outside off stump, Ganguly guides it to third man. Another unconvincing stroke. Too much opening the face of the bat.
lands on a length, on the middle and off stump line, cuts away slightly, Tendulkar adjusts to the movement and defends to the off side
length delivery outside off stump - 143 kmph - and Tendulkar leans forward to push it to the off side
another length delivery, on the middle and off stump line, Tendulkar gets behind the line to push it down the track.
143.1 kmph, just outside the off stump, again on a length, Tendulkar moves towards the line and plays it quietly into the covers
beaten. Full in length, just outside the off stump, cuts in a touch and Ganguly is troubled by the late movement. His bat comes outside the line as the ball flashes past the off stump.

More woes for Ganguly and Akmal. Four byes. Another peach of a delivery that moved in late after landing on a length just outside off stump. Again Ganguly pushed outside the line and the ball, to be fair to Akmal, swung after it passed the stumps. Posthumous swing as we call it. And it swung past the right of Akmal who was in no position to collect it
on the off stump this time, Ganguly leans forward to defend. Gul has started off really well,
bit of width outside off stump and that allows Ganguly to dab it to third man for a single.
hits the deck short of length, it rears at the rib-cage. Tendulkar hops up, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and wrists it to fine-leg boundary.
Fluent cover drive. It was full pitched and outside off, Tendulkar glided towards the line, opened the bat-face and cover drove it through the field. It went along the ground.
Ganguly breaks free with a cut. It was short and wide, Ganguly didn't move back and across, just hopped back and picked the gap well.
straighter, on the stumps, Ganguly moves back, pushes it to extra cover and they rush across for a quick single. India are on 21 in 14 legal deliveries.

Edged over first slip! Unlucky Akthar. He banged it in short, around the middle and off stump line, Tendulkar hopped up and fended at it but the ball left him late and took a bit of a handle before flying over first slip.
143.5 kmph, fuller delivery, on the middle and leg stump line, Tendulkar tries to work it to the on side but is late on the shot and is struck on the pad.
full pitched, 147.2 kmph, on the middle and off stump line, Tendulkar gets right behind the line, the bat comes down straight and he pushes it towards mid-off
beaten 146.6 kmph, full length delivery, slightly outside off stump and Tendulkar goes for the drive but he ends up pushing outside the line and the ball flies between the bat and pad gap.
132.5 kmph, short of length, slanting away from Ganguly who steers it to backward point. Gul had troubled SCG in the last over.
fuller, around the off stump, Ganguly square drives through point, no footwork whatsover, and Salman Butt gets a hand to the ball as he dives at point

edged through the vacant second slip. Just one slip in place. It landed on a length, outside off stump and shaped away, Ganguly pushed at it, bat well away from the body, the feet struck to the ground and the ball flew to third man boundary.
steers a length delivery to point

139.1 kmph, full in length, outside off stump and it holds its line. Again, like in the previous over, Ganguly stabs at it, outside the line and the ball rushes through to Akmal via the bat and pad gap
fuller, outside off stump and Ganguly, again, doesn't quite lean forward but drives to cover
Full, fast, on the middle and leg, flicked past square leg for a single.
takes it away from Ganguly who follows the ball, opens the face of the bat and guides it to backward point
a tad short in length, on the off stump line, Ganguly moves towards the line this time and tries to punch it on the up but doesn't get much power behind it and the ball rolls towards point
from wide of the crease he bangs it in short - 146 kmph - but the line is wrong: down leg, and a wide is called

More trouble for Ganguly and Akmal. It was a length delivery zipping past the off stump, kept a tad low, Ganguly jabbed at it, again, outside the line and the ball went past the off stump, bounced just before Akmal and he couldn't collect.
141.5 kmph, short of length, outside off stump, Ganguly punches it on the up to left of cover where Afridi makes a fine stop. That ball was racing away.
fuller but on the leg and middle, Ganguly places it to right of square leg for a single
on a length, angling away from Ganguly who moves his feet, gets back and across, close to the line and pushes it to covers
on the off and middle, from a length, Ganguly plays it towards point.
Whoa! a six over long-off. Down he came down the track, kept his head still and knifed a short of length delivery up and over long-off. Fab shot.
fuller, outside off stump, driven through covers for more runs.
in the zone outside off stump, Tendulkar leans across, covers the off stump and allows the ball to go through to Akmal. Perhaps he thought Akmal would let another bye!
straighter and Tendulkar pushes it towards mid-on, they think about a single before Tendulkar shouts a loud NO
banged in short, on the leg stump line, pulled to right of fine leg for a single
Slower one, 116 kmph, full and dipping in front of off and middle, Tendulkar waits on the ball and places it to wide mid-on region for a single
leans forward to drive a fullish delivery to right of Malik at extra cover
short in length, on the middle and leg, Ganguly shuffles across, opens up in his stance and works it to midwicket

fuller, on the middle and off stump line, Ganguly was looking for a single, so he doesn't drive with his usual flourish, just pushes it towards mid-off but he had timed it too well and the ball raced away to the fielder and he had kill his thought about the single
around the off stump, Ganguly stands tall to force it away but hits it straight to point
The runs keep coming. It landed short of length, outside off stump and held its line, Tendulkar was on the front foot and he forced it away through point. Got nicely on top of the bounce there.
crack. Fuller, just outside off stump, Tendulkar bent his back knee and carved it past point. Very eye-catching stroke.
slightly slower and it swung away late, full and outside off stump, Tendulkar gets on to the front foot, sees the swing, waits and plays it late towards point. Well bowled and very well adjusted.
drifts on to the legs, flicks it away to long leg for a single
sharp bouncer, on the middle stump line, Ganguly shapes to pull but pulls out of the stroke at the end.

Here comes Ganguly's response. He takes a couple of steps down the track, moving diagonally outside leg in the process, Gul tries to fire in a yorker, ends up as a low full toss on the leg stump and Ganguly drives it inside-out through wide mid-off
well outside off stump, full and angling away, left alone
Walks across the stumps, gets close to the line of a delivery slanted away from him and square drives but Afridi dives to his left to make a fine stop.
on the middle stump line, whipped through midwicket and they pick up three runs as Yousuf ambles after it. They had settled for two when Tendulkar shouted out for the third run and Ganguly responded
on the off stump line, punched to point
keeps a tad low, on the off stump line, Ganguly eases it to point
slower one, around 111 kmph, it landed outside off stump, cut away from Ganguly who let it go and it bounced at least twice before it reached Akmal
on a length, full and on the stumps, wristed past midwicket
banged in short, chest-high, on the middle stump, Tendulkar hops up, gets on top of the bounce and rolls his wrists to the leg side
drifting on to the leg side, flicked to fine leg
full and straight, on the stumps, Tendulkar tapped it to the on side
on the off stump line, pushed to point

shout for lbw as Ganguly leans forward to defend a full length delivery. It landed just outside off stump and hit him in front of off and middle. Close. Pretty close. Its been given a run, is it? Hmm . it hit the pad first . Ganguly lifted his bat and acted as if he had hit it!

Edged and gone. Tanvir gets the breakthrough and it was a good catch from Akmal. Full and slanting away from Tendulkar who tried to flash it through cover but edges it low to the right of Akmal who dives acrobatically to take it.
leans forward to defend a full length delivery to covers
full in length, outside off stump, left alone
full and straight, driven to mid-off
he moves to the leg side and Gul bangs it in really short and it sails above Ganguly who lets it go through to Akmal
on a length, on the middle stump line, turned to the on side

again he backs to the leg side and heaves a length delivery on the leg stump line past midwicket. He had wanted to hit it over mid-on but the ball made contact with the inner half of the bat and went past midwicket.
on the hips, tucked away to fine leg for a single
fullish, on the off stump, driven to cover
on a length, tickled to third man
full on off stump, looking for some inswing, Gambhir defends watchfully
fuller length on off stump, he comes forward and rolls the wrists, picking the gap at backward square leg
short and wide, Ganguly reaches out and slaps it through gully for one
full and wide, he reaches out and drives with an inside-edge to short fine leg
short of a length, his feet don't move as he tries to run one fine to third man, and the result is a mistimed shot to backward point
short of a length on middle and leg, turned into the midwicket region for one
good length outside off stump, coming in and Gambhir inside-edges onto his back leg as he tries to dab it towards gully
short of a length outside off stump, poked to point
short of a length outside off, comes in and he jabs it to cover
short and climbing outside off, slashed to third man
backs to leg side as he comes down the track, doesn't connect with his heave well and it rolls over to the off side

The off stump goes for a walk. The ball landed on a length, outside off and came in, Ganguly pushed at it with an open face of the bat; the bat went outside the line, the ball cut in, thudded into the left thigh before hitting the off stump. Double joy for Tanvir as Pakistan swing right back
similar delivery, Yuvraj makes sure he plays close to the body and pushes it to cover
drifts on to the legs and Yuvraj wrists it past square leg. Easy pickings.
better, it came in from just outside off stump, bit of bat and pad as Yuvraj pushes forward to defend. Akmal stifles his appeal, Tanvir doesn't appeal and India are on 86 for 2
full and outside off stump, Yuvraj leans on the front knee to drive it but sends it straight to point
slower one, outside off stump, Yuvraj is made to wait and rolls his wrists over the ball to push it to third man region
length delivery on the off stump, around 131 kmph, pushed to the off side
fuller, 132.4 kmph, outside off stump, slanting away from Gambhir who square drives to point
homing in on the off stump, Gambhir plays with soft hands, drops the ball to the right of backward point and picks up a single
141.2 kmph, short of length delivery, on the middle stump, Yuvraj stands tall to get on top of the bounce and keeps it down in front of him
on a length, around middle stump line, defended to the off side.
from slightly wide of the crease, another one on the length, around off and middle, Yuvraj gets right behind the line to defend with the full face of the bat
on the off stump line, coming in with the Tanvir angle, Gambhir leans forward to push it to the off side. 2 wickets for 14 runs so far.
fuller, just outside off stump, Gambhir moves towards the line to dead-bat it away
on the middle and off stump line, Gambhir leans forward and wrists it to square leg as the ball keeps coming in.
I was about to say impressive line but he sends this one down the leg side.
back to the off stump line, holds its line and Gambhir pushes it to point. He then practices the shot again.
charges out to drive but hits straight to cover. Tanvir has a few words to say at Gambhir who turns the monologue into a dialogue
fuller, low full toss in fact, Gambhir tries to swat it away but gets a inside edge on to the pad. He swivels around to check whether it has gone on to stumps but it had rolled away to the off side.
full in length, outside off stump, left alone
right on target, on that off and middle line, from slightly short of length, Yuvraj goes back to defend.
on a length this time, on that middle and off again, Yuvraj is on the back foot and lunges forward at the last minute to defend it to the off side
just outside off stump, moving away, Yuvraj moves across, opens the bat-face and guides it to point
143.3 kmph, short of length and outside off stump, Yuvraj allows it to go through to Akmal
fuller, outside off again, Yuvraj drives but the bat handle rotates in his hand and he ends up mistiming it to covers
on the middle and off stump, nagging line continues and Gambhir works it to midwicket. This is excellent bowling from Akthar and Tanvir, not giving anything away to the batsmen
again full in length, on the middle and off, Gambhir can only push it back down the track

tries to break free with a drive but sends it uppishly to left of mid-off. It was fuller, on the off stump and Gambhir sliced it in the air. Yousuf didn't move forward, waited for the ball and that allowed the batsmen to rush through for a quick single. Sure he fired a direct hit at the non-striker's end but too late
on the off stump line, on a length, guided to point
drifts on to the hips and Yuvraj tucks it away to fine leg for a single
on that off stump again, from a length, Gambhir leans forward, there is no room to work it around and he pushes it to point
starts off with a delivery just outside leg stump, Yuvraj flicks it past square leg and Gul misfields to give away an extra run
slightly short, on the middle and leg again, worked past square leg for a single.
flighted delivery on the leg and middle, Gambhir ran down the track to drive between the bowler and mid-on

Drama! Afridi and Gambhir sledge each other! It was on the leg and middle stump line, pushed to short third man region for a single. Gambhir and Afridi collide. Afridi says Gambhir should have gotten off the path but Gambhir thinks otherwise. Both get very close to each other - bumper to bumper traffic! - and go at each other. Umpire has to intervene, he speaks to the two and then to Malik. Crowd roar and the ODI has come alive. The bowler is entitled to stay on his follow-through and the batsman has to run around him. Anyway ,... back to the game
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
Another dot ball as the over comes to an end

full and on the middle and off  stump line, Gambhir leans forward to defend. Even if he bowls on the middle, Gambhir will wrist it away to the on side and Tanvir has been impressive, keeping in on the off and middle or just outside off.
beaten as Gambhir tries to cut a length delivery outside off
fuller, outside off and Gambhir leans forward to drive through covers
short of length, cuts in from just outside off, toward middle stump, Yuvraj is on the front foot and defends to the leg side
full and just outside off stump, holding its line, Yuvraj thinks it will come in, pushes at it with an open face of the bat and is beaten.
on the leg and middle stump line, turned past square leg for couple of runs.
comes down the track, gets too close to the length and drives it back to Afridi
picks a single with a dab to fine leg
Fab cover drive. Easy on the eye. Flighted one outside off stump and Yuvraj went down on his front knee to cream it through extra cover.
on the off stump line, pushed to cover
pushed that one through slightly quicker, just outside off stump, nudged to short third man region for a single
on a length, on the middle stump line, Yuvraj turns it to left of midwicket and sets of for a run but Gambhir sends him back
beaten. Teasing delivery outside off stump, shapes away late and Yuvraj has a near fatal poke
on a length, on the off and middle stump line, pushed to cover
full and outside off stump, dabbed past backward point for a single. Oops no single. The backward point fielder moved to his right to make the stop
and again, this time straight to backward point
on the middle line, Yuvraj thrusts his front foot across and then has to play around it and pushes it towards mid-on.
flighted delivery, again on that middle and leg line, Gambhir ran down the track, again gets too close to the ball and drives it to midwicket
on the off and middle line, Gambhir stays back and late cuts it through backward point
flighted full, driven to long-off
quick single as Yuvraj turns a delivery on the middle and leg to left of Malik at midwicket
slider on the off stump line, Gambhir guides it to point region for a single
outside off stump, full in length, Yuvraj taps it gently towards Yousuf at backward point and they will get the single
on the leg stump line, swept away to backward square leg
from round the stumps, outside off stump, fullish, Yuvraj top edges a sweep to just behind square leg for a single. There is a backward square leg in place and he moved to his right to make the stop
leans forward to defend a delivery on the off and middle to cover point
comes down the track to scoop a flighted delivery to sweeper cover
on the stumps, swept to backward square leg
outside off stump, slid away, left alone
comes down the track to loft a delivery towards long-on
picks up a single with a drive to long-off
Gambhir turn to do the same and the runs keep coming in singles
slider on the off stump line, tapped to backward point
First sign of turn and bounce. It landed slightly short, outside off stump, Gambhir shaped to cut but the ball bounced even as it turned in and Gambhir adjusted by just chopping it to the off side
on the middle stump line, slight turn and Yuvraj dead-bats it to off side
on the middle and leg, Yuvraj sweeps it hard, along the ground, to deep backward square leg
turning away from the off stump, pushed through cover point for a single
on the off stump line, keeps low, Yuvraj had to lunge and he forced it through extra cover
on the leg stump line and he sweeps it to backward square leg
flighted delivery on the off stump line, turned to the on side
turning in towards middle stump, worked to backward square leg
comes down the track, Rehman drags back the length and Gambhir clips it past the backward square leg, with the turn, for a single
fuller, on the off and middle, worked to midwicket
gets on to the front foot before clipping it to fine leg

Gone! Sharp turn there! It landed outside the off stump, short in length, Gambhir shaped to cut but was surprised  and cramped-up as the ball broke back in sharply and he just dabbed at it. The ball hit the bat and ran on to the stumps.
on the middle stump line and Yuvraj pulls out another sweep shot and will get a single
slow through the air, on the middle and off, turns in, played to midwicket
outside off stump, on a length and it didn't turn much, Dhoni played it late and wristed it through the vacant slip region. Partly edged and partly steered.
leans forward to push it to extra cover
slows up the pace, lands on a length, on the middle and off and turns past the outside edge
dropped by Salman Butt. Yuvraj swept one from the stumps, the ball made contact at the toe-end of the bat and went low to left and in front of Butt at midwicket; he dived but couldn't hold on.
outside off stump, pushed to off side
arm-ball from round the stumps. Dhoni is struck on the pad as he went back but it was going down leg side
leans forward and jabs at a delivery, way ahead of his body, and edges it to the on side

shout for lbw as Yuvraj is struck on the pad as the ball turns in from outside off stump. He was struck in front of middle and leg and the ball was turning. Close shout. Yuvraj was caught at the crease, neither forward not back.
leans forward to defend to covers
uses his feet and drives to long on
spins down the leg side
on the stumps, jabbed to the leg side
leans forward to defend it back down the track
again slow through the air, on the middle and off, pushed back to Malik
tossed-up, full, Dhoni stretches forward to drive through the off side
Pushed to cover
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, driven off the front-foot to the cover point region
pushes forward and taps it away for another single
too close to cut but Dhoni goes for it and the ball zips past the outside edge
tossed up on middle and off, Dhoni get a good stride in and defends it watchfully
bit of a leading edge and the ball rolls away towards extra cover, no room for a single there
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
another line and length delivery, defended watchfully
fuller in length, driven straight back to the bowler
quicker delivery, drifting down the leg side, Yuvraj tires to flick it away fine but fails to make contact
and again, Yuvraj is made to play defensively
end of a fine over and he ends it with a quicker delivery, no room offered
stays low, Dhoni goes for the cut and ends up with a bottom edge
defended off the back-foot
shot! in the slot, Yuvraj gets a good stride in and slog sweeps it over the midwicket fence. Fantastic shot to break the shackles
cut away off the back-foot to the backward point region

and again! tossed up outside the off stump, this time Yuvraj comes down the track, nicely gets to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it straight back down the track and the ball sails over the fielder at long-on

Now Dhoni goes downtown. Indians are on the counterattack here as the pitch has started to aid turn and keep low. He charged down the track, reached the pitch of a delivery outside off stump and sent it sailing over the sight screen
flatter, turned to the leg side for a single
spins down the leg side and its an easy decision to give
Imperious. The marauder is on the prowl. He ran down the wicket and swung a delivery from just outside off over wide long-on. India gallop to 170. The ball is atop the shamiana in the stands.
floated outside off, pushed to right of backward point for a easy single
The runs are coming in a deluge. Short of length, outside off stump and Dhoni slapped it through extra cover. Neither horizontal nor vertical, a forceful slap on the up.
full pitched, outside off, driven hard to cover
lands on a length, on the off stump, keeps low as it moves in towards middle, worked to midwicket
Ah! the slower one , full and well outside off stump, Dhoni picks it up late and checks his intended drive and allows it to go through to Akmal
length delivery, homing in on the off stump, Dhoni moves forward to drive it past the bowler
digs it in short, on the hips, clipped to left of fine leg where Gul comes across to make the stop
outside off stump, Yuvraj cuts it late to left of backward point
lands outside leg stump, doesn't turn in enough, Dhoni tries to play a vertical sweep shot, misses and so does Akmal.
faster, flatter, on the middle stump line, jabbed away to the off side
whack. That bottom-hand again. It was slightly short in length, outside off stump, Dhoni rocked back to thrash it through cover point
More runs. Again a touch short in length - perhaps Afridi is expecting Dhoni to charge out - and Dhoni stood tall to blast it through cover
slower in the air, fullish, on the middle and off stump, Dhoni leans forward, opens the bat-face and places it into the gap at cover point
slower, full and on the off stump, Dhoni waits before driving, along the ground, to long-off
another slower one, 109.4 kmph, in the zone outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to adjust and play a cut but misses it
yet another slower delivery, on the middle stump line, Yuvraj Singh plays it carefully, bat and pad close together, down the track
bangs it in short but the line is wrong and it goes down the leg side. Yuvraj had tried to pull it away but can't connect
short in length, on the off stump line, Yuvraj punches it on the up, through the line, past the bowler
bouncer outside off stump, Dhoni allows it fly past him. One for the over, signals the umpire as he taps his left shoulder with his right hand
from wide of the crease, comes a ball almost in the blockhole, jabbed back down the track. But Akthar had overstepped and the next delivery is going to be a free hit

'caught' at long-off! A slower one, full and on the off stump line, Dhoni is beaten by the change of pace but goes through with his bottom-hand powered chip stroke and it goes right down the throat of long-on. Dhoni immediately asks for a change of bat. More meat needed.
drifts down the leg side, wide;
slider, hurries on to Dhoni who is struck on the pad, but outside leg stump
Short in length, outside off stump, carved away through cover point
on the leg stump line, flat and quick, Dhoni tries to work it to leg side, misses and is hit on the pad
on the off stump line, nudged away to off side
fuller, right up there at the block hole, defended on the front foot
right on target, on that off stump line, worked to midwicket
And again. Tanvir has started off from where he left off in his earlier spell.
comes down the track, Tanvir keeps his cool and sends it straight and Dhoni is hit on the pad. On the leg stump line though.
leans forward to wrist a fullish delivery on middle past square leg
a tad short in length, outside off stump and Dhoni cuts it to deep point for a single
overpitched outside off stump, Yuvraj goes for a square drive and ends up slicing it to Yousuf at wide third man
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
back over the sticks. Yuvraj goes down on his front knee to drill a sweep  to deep square leg boundary. That's his fifty too.
And he goes downtown. The white ball is flying everywhere. It was floated outside off stump and Yuvraj hit it cleanly - the bat came down smoothly like a golf swing- over long-off
on the stumps. Dhoni heaves it, the ball makes contact with the inner half of the bat, and goes past midwicket
turning in towards middle and leg, clipped past square leg for a single
yorker, just outside off stump, Yuvraj brings his bat down in a hurry and chops it to third man
lands outside leg stump, moves towards leg, jabbed bat and pad to the off side
on the off and middle, on a length, driven to long-off for a single
slower one, full and on the off stump line, steered to cover point
on the off and middle, inside edges a drive to wide midwicket
low full toss, shaving past the off stump, Yuvraj had backed to the leg side and tried to carve it over off side but can't get wood on leather
fullish, just outside off stump, mistimes a drive to extra cover but they will take a single
from round the stumps, lands on a length, well outside off stump, Yuvraj is early into his drive and sends it in the air towards wide long-on

attempted yorker, ends up as a low full toss, homing on the middle and off, carved to wide third man. The bat slipped out of his hand as he brought it down quickly, the bat hit the ground and was yanked out of his hand
another full toss, not so low but just below waist-high, outside off stump, slashed to Misbah at deep point
moves outside leg stump, Gul, from round the stumps, follows him with a full pitched delivery and Yuvraj drills it down to long-on
full and straight, on the middle, pushed to left of cover for a single. The 100 partnership has come in 91 balls.

Cleans him up with a slower one! Full and dipping outside off stump, Dhoni was beaten by the change of pace, was caught at the crease as he tried to drive it through cover but instead, got a fatal inside-edge on to the leg stump.
short of length, on the middle and leg stump, Robin shuffles across and clips it off his hips, past square leg for a single
slower one, turns in from just outside leg stump, Yuvraj waits and pats it gently towards cover point for a single
again he shuffles across to clip a length delivery on the middle and leg to behind square leg
beaten Shifts his line to outside off stump and Uthappa is beaten, trying to run it down to third man
on the off stump line again, this time he runs it down to third man
flat and quick, outside off stump, Uthappa tries to cut it but is beaten
gets off the strike with a punch down the leg side
slower through the air, down the leg side and Yuvraj shapes to sweep, sees that the ball is really slow and just helps it along to the fine leg boundary
short in length, turnign in from outside off, cut through backward point
tossed-up, outside off stump, Yuvraj Singh goes down on his knee and swings it across to wide long-on. Too much bottom hand and the bat handle rotated a touch
goes back to work it to the square leg for region
brings Uthappa to the strike with a drive. Will Uthappa go after the bowling> or will he hand over the strike to Yuvi?
the slower one again, outside off stump, Uthappa ends up mistiming and inside-edging a drive to the leg side.
he walks down the track as is his wont, Shoaib sends down another slower one, full and it swings away late and Uthappa pushes it to cover point
on the off and middle, on a length, Uthappa shuffled across and tried to force it away but is late on the stroke and the ball runs through extra covber. He was shaping to swing it to the leg side
fuller and faster, hint of inswing, driven to long-off for a single
yet another slower one - his change of pace has been the faster one today, he has very cleverly mixed up things- on the leg and middle, flicked to square leg
full and just outside off stump, driven to cover
moved outside leg stump and smashed a floater on the stumps, right over the bowler's head. He first moved to his right before walking outside leg stump
goes over the wicket, outside off stump, Uthappa tries to reverse sweep, misses and it runs off the pad
down the leg side and Yuvraj misses to connect with his sweep shot.
The pressure is telling on Rehman. This one is way outside off stump.

And he gets a wicket! It was flighted delivery, on the stumps, Yuvraj went for his sweep shot - down on the front knee- but top-edged it high in the air towards deep midwicket. Misbah positioned himself under it and managed to hold on as it swerved away from him.
reverse sweeps for a boundary! It was just outside leg stump, turning in, Uthappa reverse swept it through backward point
he misses a reverse sweep now. It was tossed outside leg stump, turning in, Uthappa failed to connect and strangely, a wide is not called.
walks to the leg side and drives to long-off for a single
low full toss, outside off stump, mistimes a drive to cover. Uthappa is not happy with the wood he has and wants a change of bat. It will probably happen at the end of the over
he can go and see the new bat in the dressing room! Full in length, short of the blockhole, Uthappa missed to connect with his heave and was cleaned up.
welcomes him with a bouncer but it goes down the leg side as Harbhajan sways away from the line
fullish, on the middle stump line, worked to square leg
on the off and middle, on a length, Harbhajan short-arm jabs it to midwicket

run out missed. Yorker was jabbed to Malik at midwicket and Harbhajan was well short of the crease as Malik ran towards the stumps but missed a under-arm throw from pretty close to the stumps. He can't believe that he has missed.
fullish, on the middle stump line, jabbed to the off side

arm-ball just outside off stump, cut to point and he rushes across for a quick single. Again a run out chance is missed. The throw came at Rehman who had placed himself in front of the stumps and fumbled while collecting.
dances down the track diagonally to the pitch of the ball and lofts it over long-on. Clean hit.
pushed through, outside off stump, dabbed past point
on the middle stump, Harbhajan wanted to swing it over midwicket but ended up mistiming it to the right of midwicket
fuller, almost at the yorker length, outside off stump, jabbed away past point
caught by a ball boy, beyond the long-off boundary. Down he came, Rehman pushed it well outside off stump but Pathan lunged across and connected well wit his lofted shot.
yorker, ends up as a low full toss, swung to deep midwicket
another yorker, on the off stump line, jabbed away to the on side for a single.

comical! He walked down the track, then went right across the sticks to try and paddle it away but ended up yorking himself and some how managed to get it to square leg region. Misbah would have understood the pain of Harbhajan!
just a single as he drives through the on side. It has been a very fine last over so far.
fullish, outside off stump, Harbhajan took his left foot out of the line and hit it to wide long-off for couple of runs. The last ball coming up.
Oh! its a no ball. Free hit coming up. This one was a inswinging yorker on the off stump line, Harbhajan stabbed it away with the help of inside edge to short fine leg
fullpitched outside off stump, just short of yorker length, sliced over backward point for couple of runs.

inn2.comm: Full and swinging, outside off stump, really full and moved late, Butt squeezes it to wide third man
What can you say about Afridi that has not been said before? He whacks the first delivery to the long-on boundary. It was full in length, on the stumps and he killed it down the ground.
And typically, he is beaten in the next delivery. Outside off stump this time and he tries to swing it across the line.
Full in length, slanting away from Afridi who tries to slog it over midwicket and gets a inside-edge, and it bounces before it reaches Dhoni!

on the off stump again, from a length, Afridi tries to loft it over mid-on, makes contact with the inner-half of the bat and it runs away through wide mid-on. Afridi wanted third run, was in the middle of the track but Butt was firmly struck at the non-striker's end
There he goes again. He just leans forward to force a length delivery outside off through extra cover. Hit on the up and Uthappa can't reach it in time.
some swing right away. Full and tailing away late, Butt stabs at it and gets a outside edge past the second slip.
on a length this time, moving away, steered to point
too short and wide, Butt walks down the track to slap it past cover

streaky edge through slip cordon. It was fuller in length and moved away late, Butt was squared-up and he jabbed at it, the ball flew off the outside edge, fell short of Tendulkar and ran away to the boundary
short and wide- he is punctuating some fine deliveries with bad ones - cut hard but there is a fine half-stop made at point
on a length, around off stump, pushed to covers
in the corridor outside off, Butt shuffles across, ends up outside off but sees the movement away and decides to let it swing past him to Dhoni
beaten again. Living on the edge. Full, closer to the off stump and Butt drives away from the body but the ball moves away late
around the off stump again, off the good length, Butt shuffles to get close to the line and defends to the off side.
again he shuffles, the ball is full and on the off stump and Butt lunges forward to drive to mid-off.
slightly short in length, again just outside off stump, Butt punches it to cover
fullish, curving into Afridi who whips it through midwicket
Would you believe it? He attempts a paddle shot now! It was a length delivery just outside leg stump and Afridi tried to help it along past the short fine-leg fielder.

Afridi is cleaned up. Death by aggression. Typical. It landed a tad short of length, on the off stump and curved in slightly, Afridi took a step forward and tried to hit it out of the ground, perhaps back to Karachi, and missed it completely. The ball kept a touch low and hit the middle of the off stump and  up went Pathan on a celebratory hop.
fuller, on the middle and leg, Younis goes back to work it to midwicket
on the off stump line, pushed through cover point
again he mixes up good deliveries with bad ones. This one is short and Butt says thank you before pulling it through midwicket
back to a fuller length, shaping away from Butt who pushes it to point
lovely straight drive. It was full in length, shaping in the air, Younis took care to arrest the front foot movement and drove it between the bowler and mid-on
almost deja-vu. This he drove it straight back down the track and RP lunged to his left to make the stop
takes it away from Younis this time and he dabs it to backward point
back to swinging it back in to Younis and he again drives it straight back at RP
140.7 k mph, slightly short in length, just outside off stump, Younis goes back and across to run it down to third man
full in length, on the stumps, Butt leans forward to jab it away to midwicket
on the middle stump, curving in, Younis dabs it to the on side. One wide slip and a very short fine leg in place
swinging down the leg side and it brushes the thigh pad en route to Dhoni who appeals...
shifts his line to the off stump, shaping in but Younis was ready and caressed it down the ground. Zaheer Khan was slow in getting across from mid-off and can't stop. Younis is playing very fluently.
short in length, just outside off stump, Younis rocks back to whiplash cut it past point
slightly short in length, outside off stump, forced through right of mid-off, Gambhir had got a hand to it at mid-off and took some pace off it.
slower one, 118.1 kmph, full and straight, on the middle and off, squeezed out to point
Full in length, outside off stump, Salman leans forward to punch it past the short square point and then past backward point. Pure timing.
mis fielded by Murali Kartik at mid-off. It was full and Salman drove it straight at him but he made a complete mess of it. It went right through him and to the boundary.
outside off stump, square driven to left of cover where Uthappa dives to push the ball towards mid-off
Younis is looking very good out there. It was a touch short in length, just outside off stump and Younis stands up tall to punch it on the up through cover point.
short in length, going outside off stump, holds up a touch on Younis who mistimes a punch and the ball rolls over to cover
crack. That whiplash cut from Younis. It was short in length and going away from him and he went back and across to force it past the diving point fielder.
starts off with a short and wide one - diwali gift- and Salman slaps it over point. Pakistan are on the attack here.
closer to the off stump, Salman tries to pull it but doesn't get enough wood on it and the ball rolls towards midwicket
doesn't make mistake this time. It was short in length, on the middle stump and Salman picked up the length early and short-arm jabbed it past midwicket
goes with the angle, slanting away from Salman who pushes it to short cover
fuller, around off stump, Salman drives crisply but straight to short cover
It landed outside leg stump, moved in a touch to rap Salman on the pad. Zaheer goes up in appeal but it landed well outside leg.

another shout for lbw but struck outside off while playing a shot. It was full in length, landed well outside off stump and came in sharply, Younis shuffled right across the stumps and was beaten by the inward movement
full and swinging in, on the middle, Younis shuffled across and wristed it through midwicket
beaten. It was full in length, just outside off stump and this one didn't come back in as much as Younis thought and he ended up pushing inside the line
one bounce to mid-on. Fuller, swinging in on the middle stump line, Younis drove , the bottom-hand took over and the ball went in the air but fell short of mid-on
full in length, on the off and middle stump line, driven to mid-on

RP strikes from the round the stumps!  Younis didn't play a stroke! It landed outside off stump and came in with the angle, Younis chose not to play at it, shouldered arms and to his horror, the ball kept coming in and crashed into the off stump. He was looking pretty good out there but RP changed the angle by going round and has found success.
full and shaping away from Salman who drive to cover
pushed across Salman who has a flash and a miss. The ball bounced once before Dhoni who had got his body behind the ball to make the stop.
on the off stump line, pushed to Tendulkar
on the middle and off, pushed down the track. Tendulkar moves to his left and collides with Zaheer who fields the ball. Both have a laugh.
pushes it across Salman who plays it quietly to right of Tendulkar
again goes on with that angle, punched to Harbhajan at short cover
classy cover drive. From round the stumps, full pitched outside off stump, Yousuf leaned forward, head over the ball and drove it through cover point.
drags back the length, coming in towards the off stump, Yousuf waited on the front foot and pushed it to the leg side
from wide of the crease, on a length and outside off stump, steered to backward point
similar delivery and this time Yousuf plays it late and runs it down to third man region
stays round the stumps for the left-handed Salman too. Again pushed across Salman who punches it to cover
wristy late cut. It was slanting away from him, Salman stayed adjacent to the line and just helped it along with the angle, ala Ranatunga, through the vacant slip region.
from wide of the crease, from round the stumps, lands it on the length, just outside off stump and it holds its line, Yousuf jabs at it and is beaten.
on the middle stump line, worked to right of midwicket for a single
full in length, angling across, pushed to cover
similar delivery, driven to point
fuller and Salman leans forward to push it to right of mid-off
from round the stumps, fullish, on the middle and off, Yousuf works it with the angle to right of mid-on for a single
slower one, full, around off stump, driven to cover where its mis fielded by Tendulkar
full, around off stump, driven to Murali Kartik at mid-off
full pitched outside off stump, driven crisply into the cover region
leans forward to a length delivery on the stumps and defends
full and just outside off stump, driven to cover where Tendulkar is stationed.
another slower one, around 114 k, full and on the middle line, jabbed down the track
from round the stumps, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
fuller, on the middle and leg, Salman tries to whip it away, makes contact with the inner half of the bat and it goes to square leg.
full pitched, on the middle and off, driven hard but Tendulkar lunges to his left to make the stop and threatens to throw down the sticks at the non-striker's end but Yousuf is inside the crease.
around off stump, going with the angle, driven to cover point
on a length, angling away from Salman who drives to Uthappa at cover
length delivery on the off stump, driven to Tendulkar at mid-off
slightly short of length, on the off stump and Yousuf leans forward a touch, plays it late and punches it through backward point. Classy strike from a classy player.
on the middle stump line, pushed to cover
fuller, just outside off stump, driven to cover
slower off cutter, just outside off stump, Yousuf leans forward, opens the bat-face and steers it to backward point
around 119 k, get prepared for a lot of off cutters from Pathan, on the off stump line, driven to cover
just outside off stump, punched to cover again
full pitched outside off stump, sliced over cover point
more runs and Salman reaches his fifty. It was full and on the legs, Salman whips  it through wide midwicket. He loves the Indian attack, doesn't he?
angled away from Salman who dabs it to third man
beaten. From round the stumps, it landed full in length and outside off stump, Salman tried to push it square and was beaten
just outside off stump, guided to backward point
overpitched outside off stump and Yousuf creams it through cover point and by the time Gambhir comes around from sweeper cover they run two
leans across to drive a length delivery outside off , straight to Gambhir
slower one, full and outside off stump, driven to right of mid-on. Tendulkar is near the boundary, waves to the crowd and they roar their approval
slightly short in length, on the middle stump, he short-arm jabs it away past square leg
slips down the leg side
full in length, Salman drives uppishly and luckily, for him, it falls just short of mid-on
short of length, outside off stump, punched to wide third man region
homing in on the off stump, steered to backward point

Yuvraj runs out Yousuf. Yousuf set off for a run after pushing to left of backward point where Yuvraj moved quickly, dived and fired in a throw at the non-striker's end. Zaheer  was standing in front of the stumps, swooped low but couldn't collect properly but the ball deflected on to the stumps!
leans forward to drive a length delivery to the on side
full and swinging outside off, pushed to the off side
homing in on the middle and off, Salman is cramped up and jabs it away to the off side
short delivery on the middle and off stump line, Malik stands tall on the back-foot and presents the full face of the bat, well played
good length delivery on the pads, turned away straight to the fielder at midwicket, required rate is now over 6
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, angling across - Malik goes for the cut and is beaten by the lack of bounce. Ball goes through to the keeper on the second bounce
short of a good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and too close to cut. Butt goes for the cut and the ball zips past the outside edge. Wrong shot selection there
another tight delivery, Butt on the back foot defending

short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Butt stays back and looks to work it away on the leg side, ball clips the outside edge and spoons down to third man, would have been close if there was a slip in place
good length delivery, coming in with the angle. Malik moves back and across and works it down to fine leg for an easy single
pushed away towards cover, no room for a single
punched down to mid-on, again straight to the fielder
turning in from wide outside the off stump, Malik stays back and taps it away on the off side
another big turner - this one started off from off stump and drifted down the leg side
better line, Malik defends it back to the bowler
spin and turn, Malik looks to work it down to fine leg but fails to make contact
defended watchfully
steered down to fine leg
slightly short and Butt punches it away off the back-foot
full and on the middle and off stump line, defended stretching well forward
cut away off the back-foot to the point region
short outside the off stump, Malik goes back and cuts it away well wide of the fielder at gully, no protection in the deep and the ball races away to the fence
forced away for a single
slightly short and Butt is beaten, loud appeal for lbw turned down
turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region
punched off the front-foot to the mid-off region
tossed up on the middle and off stump line, defended
driven straight to Yuvraj at short cover
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Butt has a poke at it and the ball rips past the outside the edge
defended on the front-foot
on the middle and leg stump line, turning across. Butt stays back and punches it straight back down the track to the mid-off region, just a single off the over
spins in from outside off, nudged to the on side
leans forward to smother the turn and drives to long-on
flighted from round the stumps, drifts in the air, lands on the middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
on the off stump line, driven to extra cover
slightly short in length, turning in from outside off, worked with the turn to deep midwicket
flatter, pushes it through quicker, jabbed to square leg
leans forward to play with soft hands, out to covers
floated on the off stump line, driven to cover point
leans forward, gets down on his left knee to play a fine paddle sweep to beat Murali Kartik at fine leg
sharp turn but it spins down leg side and Malik withdraws his bat from the line
fuller, outside off stump and Malik leans forward, bat and pad close together and is rapped on the pad as he shapes to defend
on the off and middle, turned, with the turn, to midwicket
lands well outside off stump, on a length and Malik stretches well forward and across to defend
picks a single with a dab to the leg side
spins down the leg side, keeps  very low and Dhoni fails to gather
lands on the middle and off stump, pushed through quicker, worked to midwicket
full, too full, again quick through the air, driven to cover
leans forward to defend a ball drifting in towards middle and off
lands on the middle and off, turns away, Malik goes back and adjusts to the turn by pushing it to point
on the middle stump, again Malik is on the back foot and punches it to midwicket
floated on the middle and off, turning away, driven through the off side
slightly short, doesn't spin much from outside off, Malik goes back to wrist it to on side
flighted delivery, spins in from outside off stump, Malik gets on the front foot, tries to work it to on side but doesn't connect properly
again on the off and middle, a tad too full and Malik drives down the track and Harbhajan dives to his right  to make a fine stop
spinning towards leg and middle, tickled to backward square leg
flighted, on the middle stump line, worked to Yuvraj Singh at midwicket
spinning in from outside off stump, cut through point
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, not much turn, slow through the air, punched back down the track

trapped in front! The change of bowling works. The lack of spin does him in. It was floated on the middle and off stump line and Malik went forward to defend, bat behind the pad. Perhaps, he though the ball would turn but this one went straight on and hit him in front of middle. Gone!
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
turns away from Misbah who plays it tentatively to the off side
on the middle, going on straight, Misbah leans forward to push it to the on side
full and on the middle and leg stump line, Salman, caught at the crease, jabs at it and gets a thickish outside edge to the off side
driven through the off side for a single
spins in from outside off stump, again puff of dust comes up, defended to the on side
pushes it further outside off, making Misbah stretch across to defend. You can see the ploy; he is trying to make him drive and spin one through the bat and pad gap
just outside off stump, Misbah leans forward and takes care to work it with the turn to backward square leg
pushes that one through quickly, catching Salman at the crease and it spins past the hurried prod. Dhoni lets out a cry of agony
slow through the air, just outside off stump, leans across to steer it to point
fuller, on the off stump, inside-edges a drive to square leg
sharp turn and bounce and this is Yuvraj! Salman shaped to cut but ended up jabbing it away
goes back to work with the turn past square leg
lands outside off stump, Misbah pokes at it tentatively and withdraws his bat from the line
there comes the sweep. Floated on the off stump and he top edges a sweep, one bounce to Pathan at long leg
flatter, quicker, on the middle and leg, tickled past square leg
spins from well outside leg stump, tries to flick it away and it runs down to fine leg
full and outside off, swept away for a single
short in length, spinning away, punched to the off side
beaten. It landed outside leg stump and spun past sharply the outside edge as Salman pushes at it
Dropped by Sehwag at silly mid-off. Flighted up, full and on the off stump line, Salman scoops it - too much bottom hand- and Sehwag jumps up but can only get his fingers to it
leans forward to drive to extra cover
slow through the air, outside off stump, paddled to short fine leg. There is a slip in place
connects well with the sweep shot and will picks up a single to long leg
Now Salman goes for the sweep shot and rotates the strike
floated outside off, fullish, driven to cover
on the off stump line, a tad too full and that allows Misbah to work it into the leg side gap for a single
short, spinning in from outside off, Misbah punches it down the ground to long on
how do you play that? It was pushed through quickly, landed outside leg stump and spun sharply right across Salman who poked at it
leans forward to drive through extra cover
lands on stumps and spins down leg side
goes back to work a spinning delivery behind square leg for a single
on the off stump, Salman plays it with soft hands and picks a single to cover point
full and outside off stump, Misbah tries to work it to the on side but is struck on the pad
comes down the track and heaves it to deep midwicket.
flighted outside off stump, driven to extra cover
a tad short in length, turning away, mistimes a cut to covers
quicker, just outside off stump, dabbed to short third man

appeal for a stumping. It was flighted outside off stump, Salman went for a slog sweep but missed it completely as the ball didn't turn in as much as he expected. The back foot was dragged out of the crease but he managed to bring it back it before Dhoni broke the stumps
turns in from outside off, Salman stays back to punch it to long-on
flat, lands outside leg stump, turns in and Salman pushes it to the off side
again pushed through quicker, keeps low as it turns across Salman who jabs at it and is beaten
leans forward to push to cover
full, really full, almost trapping Salman in the front. Salman was caught at the crease, beaten by the length but managed to bring his bat around the pad to work it to the on side
flighted up, outside off, slog swept to wide long on
tossed-up, around off stump and it spins away, Salman slashes at it, trying to square drive and gets a thickish edge past the short third man fielder
just outside off stump, full and slow, steered to point
flatter, quicker, on the off and middle, worked through midwicket
floated outside off stump, turns in slightly, Salman shapes to pull it but ends up flat-batting it to the straight boundary
short in length, turning in, pulled to deep midwicket
down the leg side and Pakistan move to 168 for 4
lands outside off, on a length, turns away, guided to backward point region
off spin, turning in from outside leg, worked to deep midwicket
Now leg spin. From round the stumps. It's a long hop and Misbah swat-pulls it to wide long-on where Uthappa moves smartly to his right to make the stop
stays round the stumps and bowls off spin but it starts around the leg stump line and Salman does well to sweep fine.
back over the wicket. Floated on the stumps, driven through the off side
outside leg stump, turned past square leg
lands well outside leg stump, turns in ever so slowly, Misbah moved outside leg, waited for the turn before cutting it to deep cover where Pathan makes good ground to make the stop
full and outside off stump, Salman lunges forward and pushes it through cover point
from round the stumps, fast and fast, arm ball, jabbed to the on side
slower this time, short in length though, and Misbah punches it to wide long-on
on the middle stump line, Misbah reverse sweeps it through backward point region. Kartik thought Misbah was struck on the pad first and appealed for a lbw.
arm ball, worked to leg side for a single
flighted one, full, driven to long-on for a single
length delivery on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
full in length, slanting away from Misbah who punches it through backward point and Harbhajan, running across from third man,  throws in a diving slide but makes a mess of it.
on the stumps, worked to midwicket
yorker length, just outside off stump, Misbah has a swing and gets a inside-edge that takes the ball dangerously close to the stumps
leans forward to push it through mid-off region
full and drifting down leg side, must have flicked the pad en route to Dhoni
floated on the middle stump, turned behind square leg
floated on the stumps, swept for a single
just outside off stump, slow through the air, not much pace to work with and Misbah taps it to the off side
drifts down leg side, flicked to left of short fine leg
nice. It was pushed through flat, on the middle stump and Salman shuffles across and sweeps it fine
shifts his line to outside off stump, full, turned to right of midwicket
Dropped by RP Singh at deep midwicket. Misbah went for a pull shot and it swerved to right of RP who clangs it.
Gets to his hundred with a punch to long-on. His fourth ODI hundred and all of them have come against India! He loves his neighbours.
cut to deep point for a single
full pitched, outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
full in length, on the off and middle, driven to Pathan. The crowd think its a catch .. nope just a bump ball
short of length, angling away from Misbah who taps it to right of third man
short in length, keeps low as it spins in towards middle, pulled away
drifting on to the pad, Misbah works it past square leg and will get two runs. Very well placed.
from over the wickets, full and on the leg stump line, Misbah sweeps it to long leg
slightly short, again flat and quick, on the leg and middle, helped along to long leg
moves outside leg stump, Kartik follows him but Misbah whips it to wide long-on. Very skilfully placed.

Kartik gets the breakthrough. After being hit for a four, he bounces back to get his man. It was delivered slow through the air, spun from outside leg stump, Misbah, who had again moved outside leg stump,  tried to play it with the turn, to the off side but missed it completely. Crucial blow.
short and climbing outside off stump, a cut and a miss
slower one, outside off stump, Salman swings it high in the air and it safely lands between long-on and deep midwicket
outside off stump, a length delivery and Salman cuts it late to right of third man
well outside off stump, fullish as well, Salman went down on his back knee to carve it over point. He is standing outside the crease.
closer to the off stump and Misbah doesn't connect with a cut shot
retains the strike with a push towards long-off.
short in length, on the middle stump, pulled to Kartik at midwicket. Kartik had a shy at the non-striker's end and had he hit, Akmal would have been run out
on the hips, clipped away behind square for a single
full in length, outside off stump, Akmal swings it across the line and through midwicket

Another one bites the dust. Akmal has driven down the throat of long-on. He walked down the track, RP dragged back the length and Akmal ended up whipping it straight to the fielder. Dhoni is delighted.
shuffles across and flicks a delivery on the legs to the boundary. Salman waging a lone battle now.

mix-up by the batsmen and RP Singh. It was driven wide of long-on and they took the first run. Salman turned for the second and saw Tanvir, who took a few steps initially, hesitate and turned back. Now Tanvir decides to complete the single and the throw comes in to RP who makes a mess as he lunges towards the stumps. Had he broken the stumps, Salman would have been out but the ball had rolled out of his grasp. NOw both batsmen were at the same end. Now Tanvir decides to run back but RP recovered to throw it to Dhoni who broke the stumps rather violently.
yorker length outside off stump, squeezed to short third man
lands outside leg and spins across Salman who steers it through cover point
pushes that one through quicker, full and straight, jabbed to the on side
on the middle and leg, swept away past square leg
floated full in length, driven to right of extra cover where Yuvraj makes a diving stop
really full, on the off stump line, driven through extra cover
whack. Moved outside leg stump and blasted a full pitched delivery through extra covers.
from round the stumps now but he slips it down the leg side
moves outside leg stump, RP follows him with a length delivery and Salman jabs it past square leg
stays round the stumps for Rehman, full and on the middle, driven to long-on for a single
low dipping full toss, on the middle, swung to long-on for a single
knocks him over. And then they were two. It landed full in length, Rehman missed to connect with his slog across the line and the ball crashed into the middle and leg stump.
moves outside leg stump and carves a delivery turning from outside leg to deep cover
dipping full toss, on the off stump, squeezed through point
pushes it through quickly, lands outside leg stump and thuds into Butt's pad
flat and quick, forced to extra cover

tries to reverse sweep, misses and has been given out lbw. It would have missed the off stump, though. It was full in length, on the off stump and Salman failed to connect. It would have turned well past the off stump. And that brings an end to a very fine innings from Salman.
on the middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
length delivery on the middle stump line, pushed towards backward point and they rush across for a single
India take the lead in the five-match series. 2 - 1 now. Full in length, on the stumps, Shoaib swings it straight to long-off.
